name: Flit: Down to Earth
description:
Fly down the mountain and explore a simple artistic level as a bird. Get speed boosts, hop through the grass, explore the forests and fly among the clouds!

Created for the Epic Game Jam in Unreal by my partner and I. We are very very new to game dev, so be gentle! Overall we are very proud to have something running and 'completed', even if it is more of a simple proof of concept. 

Will update with video and more detailed information on the assets after we catch up on some much much needed sleep. 

Music sourced from https://www.bensound.com./
